mapper.select: SELECT MEAL_CARD_ID, CALENDAR_ID, RECORD_DATE, DIVISION FROM MEAL_CARD WHERE MEAL_CARD_ID = #{mealCardId} AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT MEAL_CARD_ID, CALENDAR_ID, RECORD_DATE, DIVISION FROM MEAL_CARD WHERE CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId} AND RECORD_DATE = #{recordDate}
SELECT MEAL_CARD_ID, CALENDAR_ID, RECORD_DATE, DIVISION FROM MEAL_CARD WHERE CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId}

SELECT mc.MEAL_CARD_ID, mc.CALENDAR_ID, mc.RECORD_DATE, mc.DIVISION, mi.MEAL_ITEM_ID AS MI_MEAL_ITEM_ID, mi.MEAL_CARD_ID AS MI_MEAL_CARD_ID, mi.NAME AS MI_NAME, mi.INGREDIENT AS MI_INGREDIENT, mi.CARBOHYDRATE AS MI_CARBOHYDRATE, mi.PROTEIN AS MI_PROTEIN, mi.FAT AS MI_FAT, mi.SODIUM AS MI_SODIUM, mi.CALORIE AS MI_CALORIE FROM MEAL_CARD mc LEFT JOIN MEAL_ITEM mi ON mc.MEAL_CARD_ID = mi.MEAL_CARD_ID WHERE mc.CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId} AND mc.RECORD_DATE = #{recordDate} AND mc.DIVISION = #{division} ORDER BY mi.MEAL_ITEM_ID

SELECT mc.MEAL_CARD_ID, mc.CALENDAR_ID, mc.RECORD_DATE, mc.DIVISION, mi.MEAL_ITEM_ID AS MI_MEAL_ITEM_ID, mi.MEAL_CARD_ID AS MI_MEAL_CARD_ID, mi.NAME AS MI_NAME, mi.INGREDIENT AS MI_INGREDIENT, mi.CARBOHYDRATE AS MI_CARBOHYDRATE, mi.PROTEIN AS MI_PROTEIN, mi.FAT AS MI_FAT, mi.SODIUM AS MI_SODIUM, mi.CALORIE AS MI_CALORIE FROM MEAL_CARD mc LEFT JOIN MEAL_ITEM mi ON mc.MEAL_CARD_ID = mi.MEAL_CARD_ID WHERE mc.RECORD_DATE BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY mc.RECORD_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEAL_CARD ( MEAL_CARD_ID, CALENDAR_ID, RECORD_DATE, DIVISION ) VALUES ( #{mealCardId}, #{calendarId}, #{recordDate}, #{division} )
